1.「元ポツコン２号じゃねえですかッ！| いいところに 来ましたッ！| ちょっと こ: Isn't that Ex-Junker No. 2? You've come to the|right place! Look at this guy!

2.「こいつは あの遺跡で拾ってきた| 魔神兵とかいうガラクタの 一部なんですがね。: This is a piece of junk I picked up at the|ruins. Sitting here like this...

3.「イタタタッ！ 見てくだせえッ！| とがった部分が しりっぺたの先に当たって……:
Ouch!　Look at that! The pointy part hits the|tip of your flipper... ouch!　That's what|happens when the pointy part hits the tip of|
|your hips!

4.「ここにある たいがいのもんは| イスぐらいには なりますが| こいつは イスに: Most of the things here can be used as chairs,|but this one can't even be a chair...

5.「こりゃ正真正銘の ガラクタでごぜえますよッ！| こんな すばらしい物に めぐり: This is a genuine piece of junk! I am the|happiest man in the world to have come across|such a wonderful thing!

8.「わわっ！ ダ ダストンさまっ！| こいつ ガラクタのくせに しゃべってますよ！: Whoa!　Oh, my God, Duston! He's talking like a|piece of junk!

9.「エネルギー限界。| 凍眠室 内部 危険。凍眠室 内部 危険……。: Energy limit. Inside the hypersleep chamber|Danger. Inside the cryo-sleep chamber,|danger...

11.「さ さすがの わしでも| 死体は 勘弁でごぜえますよ……？: I'm afraid even I don't want a corpse...?

14.「……ほほう。ウルベアの魔の手より| 余を救ってくれたのは そちたちじゃな。|: I see.... It was you who saved me from the|clutches of Urbea. I have no pain. I praise|you.

15.「い いきなり出てきて エラそうに……。| アンタ いったい 何者でごぜえますか: You came out of nowhere and acted like a|jerk... Who the hell are you?

16.「これは 異なことを……。| ドワーフでありながら 余を知らぬとな？| ……まあ: How is it possible that you are a Dwarf and|yet you do not know me? Well, good. I am|generous.

17.「ならば 我が名を聞いて おそれおののくのだ！| 余は かのガテリア皇国の 正統: Then hear my name and tremble in fear! I am|Byan Dao, the rightful heir to the throne of|Gateria, the First Prince!

19.「あ…あまり反応が ないな。| ……まあ よい。余は 寛大じゃからな。: Ah...not much response. Well, that's okay. I'm|a generous man.

20.「おおっ！ そうじゃッ！| こうしては おれん！| 囚われの リウ老師を救わねば: Oh!　Yes! This is not the way! I must save|Master Liu!

21.「そち！ 奇妙な身なりをしているものの| なかなか ウデが立つと見たぞよ。| 余: Hey, you!　Despite your strange appearance, I|see that you are quite skilled. Will you do me|a favor?

22.「じつはな ウルベア地下帝国には| 余の家庭教師をつとめる リウという男が| 余: As a matter of fact, in the Urbea Underground|City, a man named Liu, who serves as my tutor,|is a prisoner just like me.

23.「そこで 余を ウルベア地下帝国まで導き| リウ老師を救出する 手助けをしてくれ: So, will you help me lead them to the Urbea|Underground City and rescue Master Liu? Of|course, you'll get your reward!

24.「うむ！ 苦しゅうない！| そち 名は なんと申す？| ……そうか <pc>と申: Mm!　No pain! What is your name? I see...you|call yourself <pc>.

25.「それでは <pc>よ！| 反重力飛行装置を 持ってまいれ！| ウルベアまで ひ: Then let's go, <pc>! Grab your anti-|gravity flight gear and let's go! Let's make a|quick flight to Urbea!

27.「……コホン。どうした？| 反重力飛行装置を 知らぬわけではあるまい？| ほれ:
...Ahem. What's up? You're not familiar with|the anti-gravity flight device, are you? You|know, the thing that lets you fly around|
|freely in the sky.

28.「まさか……！| ここには 反重力飛行装置がないと申すか！？<yesno><cl: No way...! You mean to tell me that there are|no anti-gravity flight devices here?<yesno><close>

29.「ちょっと 元ポツコン２号さん！| この部屋にあるのは ガラクタだけで| そんな: Hey, Ex-Junker #2! All you've got in this room|is a bunch of junk, and I don't see how any of|it's useful!

30.「言われてみれば 確かに……。| ここにいる者の身なりは 相当 貧相……。| こ: If you ask me, it is true that... the people|here are quite poorly dressed... this is a|section of the favela... or is it? I'm sorry.

31.「すまぬ。余の配慮が 足りなかったわ。| ならば いたしかたなし。| 地下帝国ま: I am sorry. I didn't think enough of you. Then|it is what it must be. We will go on foot to|the underground empire.

33.「ウルベアに着いたら 地下を目指すのじゃ。| 地下３階辺りにある 奥まった部屋に: When you reach Urbea, go to the basement.|Master Liu should be kept in a room in the|back, about 3F below the B3F.

34.「……ムムッ！| そちは 下々の者の依頼を たくさん抱えており| 余の頼みは 受: Mwah! It seems that you have too many requests|from the lower ranks to accept my request.

35.「……まあ よい。余は 寛大じゃからな。| とはいえ 事態は 一刻を争うのじゃ。: Oh, well. I'm a generous man. However, the|situation is time sensitive. Please help me|with the request as soon as possible.

36.「なんと！ 余の頼みを 断ると申すか！| 我がガテリア皇国の威光を| おそれぬ者: How dare you!　You dare to refuse my request?|Who would not fear the prestige of my kingdom|of Gateria?

37.「……まあ よい。余は 寛大じゃからな。| とはいえ 事態は 一刻を争うのじゃ。: Oh, well. I'm a generous man. However, the|time is short. If you change your mind, come|back.

38.「おお 待っておったぞ！| ここにいる者に まともに話せる者はおらぬ。| 頼みの: Oh, I've been waiting for you! No one here can|speak properly. You're the only one I can|count on.

39.「じつはな ウルベア地下帝国には| 余の家庭教師をつとめる リウという男が| 余: As a matter of fact, in the Urbea Underground|City, a man named Liu, who serves as my tutor,|is a prisoner just like me.

40.「そこで 余を ウルベア地下帝国まで導き| リウ老師を救出する 手助けをしてくれ: So, will you help me lead them to the Urbea|Underground City and rescue Master Liu? Of|course, you'll get your reward!

41.「じつはな ウルベア地下帝国には| 余の家庭教師をつとめる リウという男が| 囚: As a matter of fact, a man named Liu, who is|my tutor, is a prisoner in the Urbea|Underground City.

42.「そちには 余を ウルベア地下帝国まで導き| リウ老師を救出する 手助けをしても: I need you to lead me to the Urbea Underground|City and help me rescue Master Liu.

43.「ウルベアに着いたら 地下を目指すのじゃ。| 地下３階辺りにある 奥まった部屋に: When you reach Urbea, go to the basement.|Master Liu should be kept in a room in the|back, about 3F below the B3F.

44.「反重力飛行装置がないのは| いささか不便じゃが いたしかたなし。| 地下帝国ま: The lack of anti-gravity flight equipment is|somewhat inconvenient, but it is what it is.|Let's go on foot to the underground empire.

46.「ハア ハア……。待ちや <pc>。| いったい どれほど 余を歩かせるのじゃ？: Ha ha ha... wait a minute, <pc>. How|long do you expect me to walk? I'm not used to|walking.

47.「ところで <pc>よ。| そちは 来る場所を まちがえておらぬか？: By the way, <pc>. Are you sure you're|coming to the right place?

48.「進めども 進めども ガレキの山……。| 余の知っておる ウルベア地下帝国は|: Onward and onward, heaps of rubble... The|Urbea Underground City I know is not in ruins|like this, is it?

49.「深く 広く 掘られた空洞には| 虹色に輝く宝石で 装飾された家屋が並び| 頭上: Deep, wide cavities were excavated, lined with|houses decorated with rainbow-colored jewels,|and overhead, anti-gravity flying machines...

50.「のう <pc>よ。| ここが その大陸随一の大国と うたわれた| ウルベア地下: You, <pc>. Do you say that this is|the Urbea Underground City, which is said to|be the greatest power on the continent!<yesno><close>

51.「ならば なぜ かような場所に| 余を 連れてきた！| 連れてきたには それなり: Then why did you bring me to such a place! You|brought me here for a good reason!

52.「これは異なことを……。余は 信じられぬ。| あの 栄華を誇った地下帝国が| な: I cannot believe it. Why does that glorious|underground empire look like this?

53.<pc>は ビャン・ダオに|この場所が ウルベア地下帝国の|遺跡であることを伝え: <pc> informed Byan Dao that this|place was the site of the Urbea Underground|Ruins.

54.「なん…じゃと……！？| ここは ウルベア地下帝国の遺跡じゃと？| 遺跡というこ: What...what...? Are you saying that this place|is the ruins of Urbea Underground Ruins? By|ruins, you mean...

55.「ウルベアは すでに滅んで……| このありさまに……。: Urbea has already perished... and here we are.

56.「なんということじゃ……。| 余は…… 余は かの帝国が滅びるまで| 魔神兵の中: What do you mean to say that I slept among the|Demon Soldiers until the empire was destroyed?

57.「な ならば ガテリアは どうじゃ！？| <pc>よ！ そちは ガテリア皇国の|: Well, then, how about Gateria? <What about|Gatellia?　Do you know what will happen to the|Kingdom of Gateria?<yesno><close>

58.「おおっ！ 知っておると申すか！| ならば 余に 話してみい！| ガテリアは 今: Oh!　You know what I'm talking about! Then tell|me! What's going on in Gateria right now?

59.「…………………………。| 何も 答えられぬではないか。| クチから出まかせを: ... you have no answer. Don't talk out of your|mouth!

60.「……そうか。何も 知らぬのじゃな。| すなわち ガテリアも ウルベア同様| も: I see. You know nothing. I mean, Gateria, like|Urbea, is no longer here...

61.「父上も 母上も もう……。| そんな…… そんな…………。: Father and mother, they're... they're...|they're... they're... they're... they're...

62.「……すまぬ。一国の皇子である 余が| 情けない姿を さらしてしもうた……。|: I am sorry. I, the prince of a country, have|revealed my shameful appearance...please|forgive me, <pc>.

63.「だが そちの話を聞いて| あらゆることに 合点がいったわ。: But your story has brought everything into|perspective.

65.「すべて 時の流れの中で| 我らの文明が 失われてしまったため……。: All because in time our civilization was|lost...

66.「……つまりは グルヤンラシュ！| きゃつの思い通りになったということか……！: Guryan Rush! You mean you got what you|wanted...!

67.「……<pc> そちに聞かせたい話がある。| 余が この時代に来る前の話じゃ……: ...<pc> I have a story to tell you. A|story from before I came to this time...

68.「かつて この大陸には ふたつの大国があった。| 余が 国王となるはずだった ガ:
There were once two great nations on this|continent. The Imperial Kingdom of Gateria, of|which I was to be the king. And this Urbea|
|Underground City.

69.「ふたつの国は 他の種族を圧倒する技術力を有し| そこに住まう者たちは なに不自:
The two countries had a technological|superiority over other species, and their|inhabitants lived in peace without any|
|inconvenience.

70.「あの乱世の使者 奸臣グルヤンラシュが| ウルベア地下帝国に 現れるまでは……！: Until the messenger of the turbulent world,|the wicked Guryan Rush, showed up in the Urbea|Underground City...!

71.「グルヤンラシュは 高潔な神官の身なりで現れ| ウルベア皇帝に取り入ると| ふた:
Guryan Rush appeared in the guise of a|virtuous Priest and took up arms against|Emperor Urbea, forcing the two great powers to|
|fight each other.

72.「その戦いの中 多くの技術者が散り| たがいの技術と技術が ぶつかり合って| 我:
In the course of that battle, many engineers|were scattered, and as technology and|technology collided, our civilization was|
|slowly lost...

73.「……そう！ 我らの文明の喪失は| すべて グルヤンラシュの奸計によるもの！|: Yes!　The loss of our civilization was all due|to the wiles of Guryan Rush! Your schemes have|brought ruin to both our countries!

74.「……そして 行き過ぎた 戦いの果てに| 余は 命の危険に さらされた。| それ: And I was in danger of losing my life because|of my excessive fighting. It was Master Liu|who saved me.

75.「父上も母上も もう生きては いまい。| じゃが リウ老師だけは| 今も どこか: Father and mother are no longer alive. But|Master Liu must still be alive somewhere.

76.「老師は 余が この時代に来る前に| 余の後を追って 魔神兵に乗ると| 約束して: The old master promised me that he would|follow me and ride the demon soldiers before I|came to this time period.

77.「じゃが ここに老師は いない様子……。| 余は ひとまず あのガラクタ屋敷に戻: But since the old master doesn't seem to be|here, I shall return to that ramshackle house|for now and think about the future.

78.「<pc>よ これは ほうびじゃ。| この時代に価値があるかは わからぬが| あ: This is a reward for you, <pc>. I|don't know if it's worth it in this day and|age, but accept it gratefully.

79.「<pc>……。| そちは 信頼に値する者だと わかった。| 余が 困ったときは: <pc>...I have found you to be a man|worthy of my trust. If I am ever in trouble,|please lend me a hand again.

80.「リウ老師……。| そなたは どこへ行ったのだ？| 余を 時の激流に 押しやった: Master Liu... where did you go? You left me in|the maelstrom of time.
